mapper.insert: insert into content_table(content_idx, content_subject, content_text, content_file, content_writer_idx, content_board_idx, content_date) values (content_seq.nextval, #{content_subject}, #{content_text}, #{content_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content_writer_idx}, #{content_board_idx}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select a1.content_idx, a1.content_subject, a2.user_name as content_writer_name, to_char(a1.content_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as content_date from content_table a1, user_table a2 where a1.content_writer_idx = a2.user_idx and a1.content_board_idx = #{board_info_idx} order by a1.content_idx desc
